A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Given the quality of the past films\, this is one of the worst movies I have ever seen. There are just too many gripes I have with it to put in a single review. The writing is terrible. Luke's character is completely different. Light speed is not a weapon. No one cares about Rose and the casino planet. Stop trying to be like a Marvel movie we don't want excessive humor. Leia is not a God. And on and on and on....
